title: Santa Paws, Come Home
description: Stolen!The door slammed shut.Before Santa Paws knew what was happening, he was being driven far away from his home in a stranger's car. He didn't know where he was being taken--all he knew was that he had to escape. But when he breaks free he finds himself all alone in New York City, a very big and very unfamiliar place.Will Santa Paws find his way back home to the Callahans in time for Christmas?
author: Nicholas Edwards
